list_definition.definition: (of studies etc) done etc after a (first) university degree

list_ex_of_english: What comes over loud and clear in the report on postgraduates is that there is an appalling dearth of statistics.
They include postgraduates and are for students on all years of their course.
The future of the fee support scheme, which has been available to help a limited number of individual postgraduates, is under review.
Secondly, there will be a bigger proportion of undergraduates and a smaller proportion of postgraduates.
The idea of loans for postgraduates certainly needs further thought.
I have made the point that such courses will apply only to postgraduates.
We are squeezing the amount of help to postgraduates.
They will remove postgraduates from entitlement to housing benefit, without offering them loans in replacement.
